publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3865 Karen Whitefield: Congratulations to St Brigid’s Primary School in Newmains—That the Parliament congratulates St Brigid’s Primary School in Newmains, North Lanarkshire, on the occasion of its 50th anniversary; recognises the benefits that generations of Newmains children and the local community have received from the excellent work of the school during the past 50 years; notes that St Brigid’s is holding a special mass on 24 April 2009 to mark this occasion; further notes that the pupils, teachers and staff of St Brigid’s have organised a special display highlighting the school’s record of achievement over the past 50 years, and wishes the teachers, staff and pupils of St Brigid’s Primary a happy anniversary and every success in the future.

S3M-3865 Karen Whitefield: Congratulations to St Brigid’s Primary School in Newmains—That the Parliament congratulates St Brigid’s Primary School in Newmains, North Lanarkshire, on the occasion of its 50th anniversary; recognises the benefits that generations of Newmains children and the local community have received from the excellent work of the school during the past 50 years; notes that St Brigid’s is holding a special mass on 24 April 2009 to mark this occasion; further notes that the pupils, teachers and staff of St Brigid’s have organised a special display highlighting the school’s record of achievement over the past 50 years, and wishes the teachers, staff and pupils of St Brigid’s Primary School a happy anniversary and every success in the future. Supported by: Jack McConnell*
